replies.author: aq1350227
replies.txt_content:
@echo off
echo -------------------
echo by Firmanet Flame
echo -------------------
echo Now Activiting, Plase wait.
del "%cd%\.minecraft\bin\minecraft.jar" /q
copy "%cd%\.minecraft\bin\GLSLShadersCore\minecraft-Standard.jar" "%cd%\.minecraft\bin\minecraft.jar" && echo GLSL Shaders Activited|| echo GLSL Shaders Activiting Failed, Plase check if the file exist.
